response.overview: The Creature Horde is back for the next chapter of blood letting and mental torture. Witness the horror as the crew decimates spots all around the globe. From the Hesh Crew Overlords to the next wave of Fiends, no terrain is safe from this diverse group of rippers. Ride with Us. Die with Us. “This video was almost exactly like rubbing broken glass in my eyes” -Everybody that’s seen it
response.tagline: The Creature Horde is back for the next chapter of blood letting and mental torture. Witness the horror as the crew decimates spots all around the globe.
response.title: The Creature Video
